ResultsPipe#

class pipeline.ResultsPipe(*, prec_pipe=None, path_to_eeg=_Nothing.NOTHING, output_dir=_Nothing.NOTHING, path_to_hypno, hypno_freq=1, hypno=_Nothing.NOTHING, hypno_up=_Nothing.NOTHING)[source]#

Bases: BasePipe, BaseSpectrum

The results pipeline element.

Contains methods for computing and plotting PSD, spectrogram and topomaps, per sleep stage.

Methods:

plot

A wrapper for mne.io.Raw.plot().

plot_hypnospectrogram

Plots hypnogram and spectrogram.

plot_psd_per_stage

Plot PSD per sleep stage.

plot_topomap_collage

Plots topomap collage for multiple sleep stages and bandwidths.

plot_topomap_per_stage

Plots topomap for a sleep stage and a bandwidth.

save_raw

A wrapper for mne.io.Raw.save.

sleep_stats

A wrapper for yasa.sleep_statistics.

Attributes:

path_to_hypno

Path to hypnogram.

hypno_freq

Sampling rate of the hypnogram in Hz.

hypno

Hypnogram with sampling frequency hypno_freq with int representing sleep stage.

hypno_up

Hypnogram upsampled to the sampling frequency of the raw data.

psd_per_stage

[freqs array with shape (n_freqs), psd array with shape (n_electrodes, n_freqs), sleep_stage percent from the whole unrejected data]

mne_raw

An instanse of mne.io.Raw.

output_dir

Path to the directory where the output will be saved.

path_to_eeg

Can be any file type supported by mne.io.read_raw().

prec_pipe

Preceding pipe that hands over mne_raw attr.

sf

A wrapper for mne.Info["sfreq"].
path_to_hypno: Path#

Path to hypnogram. Must be text file with every row being int representing sleep stage for the epoch.

hypno_freq: int#

Sampling rate of the hypnogram in Hz.

E.g., 1/30 means 1 sample per 30 secs epoch, 250 means 1 sample per 1/250 sec epoch.

hypno: ndarray#

Hypnogram with sampling frequency hypno_freq with int representing sleep stage.

hypno_up: array#

Hypnogram upsampled to the sampling frequency of the raw data.

psd_per_stage: dict#

[freqs array with shape (n_freqs), psd array with shape (n_electrodes, n_freqs), sleep_stage percent from the whole unrejected data]

Type:

Dictionary of the form sleep_stage

plot_hypnospectrogram(picks=('E101',), sec_per_seg=4.096, freq_range=(0, 40), cmap='inferno', overlap=False, save=False)[source]#

Plots hypnogram and spectrogram.

Parameters:

  • picks (str | Iterable[str]) – Channels to calculate spectrogram on, more info at mne.io.Raw.get_data. Defaults to (“E101”,).

  • sec_per_seg (float) – Segment length in seconds. Defaults to 4.096.

  • freq_range (tuple) – Range of x axis on spectrogram plot. Defaults to (0, 40).

  • cmap (str) – Matplotlib colormap. Defaults to “inferno”.

  • overlap (bool) – Whether to plot hypnogram over the spectrogram or on top of it. Defaults to False.

  • save (bool) – Whether to save the figure. Defaults to False.

mne_raw: mne.io.Raw#

An instanse of mne.io.Raw.

output_dir: Path#

Path to the directory where the output will be saved.

path_to_eeg: Path#

Can be any file type supported by mne.io.read_raw().

plot(butterfly=False, save_annotations=False, save_bad_channels=False, scalings='auto', use_opengl=False, overwrite=False)#

A wrapper for mne.io.Raw.plot().

Parameters:

  • butterfly (bool) – Whether to start in butterfly mode. Defaults to False.

  • save_annotations (bool) – Whether to save annotations as txt. Defaults to False.

  • save_bad_channels (bool) – Whether to save bad channels as txt. Defaults to False.

  • scalings (str | dict) – Scale for amplitude per channel type. Defaults to ‘auto’.

  • use_opengl (bool) – Whether to use OpenGL acceleration. Defaults to None.

  • overwrite (bool) – Whether to overwrite annotations and bad_channels files if exist. Defaults to False.

plot_psd_per_stage(picks=('E101',), sec_per_seg=4.096, psd_range=(-40, 60), freq_range=(0, 40), xscale='linear', sleep_stages={'N1': 1, 'N2': 2, 'N3': 3, 'REM': 4, 'Wake': 0}, axis=None, save=False)#

Plot PSD per sleep stage.

Parameters:

  • picks (str | Iterable[str]) –

    Channels to calculate PSD on, more info at mne.io.Raw.get_data. Defaults to (“E101”,).

  • sec_per_seg (float) – Welch segment length in seconds. Defaults to 4.096.

  • psd_range (tuple) – Range of y axis on PSD plot. Defaults to (-40, 60).

  • freq_range (tuple) – Range of x axis on PSD plot. Defaults to (0, 40).

  • xscale (str) – Scale of the X axis, check available values at matplotlib.axes.Axes.set_xscale. Defaults to “linear”.

  • sleep_stages (dict) – Mapping between sleep stages names and their integer representations. Defaults to {“Wake”: 0, “N1”: 1, “N2”: 2, “N3”: 3, “REM”: 4}.

  • axis (Optional[axis]) – Instance of matplotlib.pyplot.axis. Defaults to None.

  • save (bool) – Whether to save the figure. Defaults to False.

plot_topomap_collage(stages_to_plot='all', bands={'Alpha': (8, 12.49), 'Beta': (12.5, 29.99), 'Delta': (0, 3.99), 'Gamma': (30, 60), 'SMR': (12.5, 15), 'Theta': (4, 7.99)}, sec_per_seg=4.096, dB=False, sleep_stages={'N1': 1, 'N2': 2, 'N3': 3, 'REM': 4, 'Wake': 0}, fooof=False, cmap='plasma', save=False)#

Plots topomap collage for multiple sleep stages and bandwidths.

Parameters:

  • stages_to_plot (tuple) – Tuple of strings representing names from sleep_stages, e.g., (“REM”, “N1”). If set to “all” plots every stage provided in sleep_stages. Defaults to “all”.

  • bands (dict) – Dict of name-value pairs - with name=arbitrary name and value=(l_freq, h_freq). Defaults to { “Delta”: (0, 3.99), “Theta”: (4, 7.99), “Alpha”: (8, 12.49), “SMR”: (12.5, 15), “Beta”: (12.5, 29.99), “Gamma”: (30, 60), }.

  • sec_per_seg (float) – Welch segment length in seconds.. Defaults to 4.096.

  • dB (bool) – Whether transform PSD to dB. Defaults to False.

  • sleep_stages (dict) – Mapping between sleep stages names and their integer representations. Defaults to {“Wake”: 0, “N1”: 1, “N2”: 2, “N3”: 3, “REM”: 4}.

  • fooof (bool) – Whether to plot parametrised spectra. More at fooof. Defaults to False. Defaults to False.

  • cmap (str) –

    Matplotlib colormap. Defaults to “plasma”.

  • save (bool) – Whether to save the figure. Defaults to False.

plot_topomap_per_stage(stage='REM', bandwidth={'Delta': (0, 4)}, sec_per_seg=4.096, dB=False, sleep_stages={'N1': 1, 'N2': 2, 'N3': 3, 'REM': 4, 'Wake': 0}, axis=None, fooof=False, cmap='plasma', save=False)#

Plots topomap for a sleep stage and a bandwidth.

Parameters:

  • stage (str) – One of the sleep_stages keys. Defaults to “REM”.

  • bandwidth (dict) – Name-value pair - with name=arbitrary name and value=(l_freq, h_freq). Defaults to {“Delta”: (0, 4)}.

  • sec_per_seg (float) – Welch segment length in seconds. Defaults to 4.096.

  • dB (bool) – Whether transform PSD to dB. Defaults to False.

  • sleep_stages (dict) – Mapping between sleep stages names and their integer representations. Defaults to {“Wake”: 0, “N1”: 1, “N2”: 2, “N3”: 3, “REM”: 4}.

  • axis (Optional[axis]) –

    Instance of matplotlib.pyplot.axis. Defaults to None.

  • fooof (bool) –

    Whether to plot parametrised spectra. More at fooof. Defaults to False.

  • cmap (str) –

    Matplotlib colormap. Defaults to “plasma”.

  • save (bool) – Whether to save the figure. Defaults to False.

prec_pipe: Type[BasePipeType]#

Preceding pipe that hands over mne_raw attr.

save_raw(fname)#

A wrapper for mne.io.Raw.save.

Parameters:

fname (str) – filename for the fif file being saved.

property sf#

A wrapper for mne.Info[“sfreq”].

Returns:

sampling frequency

Return type:

float

A wrapper for yasa.sleep_statistics.

Parameters:

save (bool) – Whether to save the stats to csv. Defaults to False.
